entry.title: Sennheiser RS 5000 Stethoset TV Listening Stystem
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sennheiser
Type: Earbuds
Price: 249.95

The elegantly designed RS 5000 is a smart listening device. It delivers a customizable TV sound experience accommodating individual listening requirements and personal taste. Three selectable hearing profiles are provided to enhance TV, movie and music listening. A unique Speech Intelligibility function increases speech clarity at the push of a button. Cutting-edge digital wireless technology delivers crystal clear sound. Intuitive controls provide ease of use. Exceptional battery life and wearing comfort ensure an enjoyable TV sound experience during long listening sessions.

Enhanced TV Sound

The RS 5000 provides a dramatically enhanced TV sound experience by allowing customization of the audio according to your listening requirements. Three hearing profiles are provided to deliver improved dialog clarity. Additionally, independent left and right volume controls are included to balance sound.

Wireless Freedom

Digital technology provides wireless freedom and crystal clear sound within a range of up to 200 feet. The built in rechargeable battery provides up to 12 hours of playing time for extended TV watching sessions.

Pressure-free Wearing Comfort

On-ear pressure is limited thanks to an ultralight, ergonomic design providing extreme wearing comfort. People who wear glasses will appreciate the stethoscope wearing style eliminating temple pressure.

Speech Intelligibility Function

A unique Speech Intelligibility function makes speech easier to understand at the touch of a button. It dynamically reduces TV background sound that can interfere with dialog. This ensures better understanding of TV program content for a more relaxed listening experience.

Connectivity and Ease of Use

The RS 5000 is easy to set up and use. Connection is done via digital (optical) or analog output standard on virtually every TV. The battery is charged when placed in the base station and the system reminds you when it’s time to recharge. When not in use the RS 5000 switches itself off automatically.

Notes:
  • Crystal clear digital wireless transmission for freedom of movement (up to 200 ft.)
  • Connectivity Technology: Wireless
  • Three selectable hearing profiles optimize speech and music playback. Speech Intelligibility feature reduces TV background noise for greater dialog clarity
  • Digital and analog inputs provide installation flexibility to TV's or other audio devices
  • Built in Lithium Polymer battery provides to 12 hours operation on a full complete charge
  • Two year warranty when purchased from an authorized Sennheiser dealer

This is a demo store. This product can be bought on HiDEF Lifestyle eshop.

All logos, images, descriptions and brands are the property of their respective owners.

Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 177.99

With our specially designed No Gap Wall Mount, your compatible Samsung TV fits snug to the wall and blends naturally into your room design, leaving nothing to distract you from the amazing picture quality on screen.

Tiltable wall mount

Worried about getting that perfect angle? The tiltable wall-mount solution lets you adjust the angle of your compatible Samsung TV after mounting it. Now you can enjoy a great view wherever you sit.

Installation simplified

Tuck away cable within stand for clean look.
Bringing beauty and elegance

entry.title: Samsung VG-SOCM05U/ZA One Connect In-Wall Cable for QLED & Frame TVs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TVs
Price: 197.99

Avoid cable mess and clutter behind the TV with this In-Wall certified cable.

UL approval type OFNP FT6 (NEC, Article 770/UL 1651) USA and Canada

Enjoy a clean and clutter-free cable solution with Samsung's One Connect In Wall Cable with sufficient length for setup.

In-Wall Connection

The One Connect In-Wall Cable allows for a clutter free solution with sufficient length for setup between the TV and the One Connect Box and is UL listed for in-wall installation.

Free your space

Make more space for you. Take advantage of the long, 5m One Connect In-Wall Cable to put your connected device nearly anywhere in the room.

The secret of the cable

Enjoy seamless entertainment. The One Connect In-Wall Connection cable ensures ultra-high performance, delivering fast images, video and IR signals.

entry.title: Samsung The Frame Customizable Bezel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TV Accessories
Price: 249.99 - 349.99 (3 variants)

Introducing The Frame from Samsung - a revolutionary way to think about your TV. When you're not watching the brilliant 4K UHD TV with HDR, it turns into a beautiful work of art on your wall. With an array of paintings, prints, photos, and frames to suit every mood and style, The Frame TV goes beyond entertainment and becomes an expression of you.

Choose from one hundred works of art

The Frame includes a gallery of professionally curated art, with one hundred free pieces worth thousands of dollars from ten different categories.

Expand your collection

Buy individual pieces or subscribe to an ever-increasing library of established and emerging artists’ work.

Customize The Frame to fit your style

Our Customizable Frame has the flexibility to fit into any home’s decor. You can change the black bezel to a wood, white or black frame, perfectly complementing your home.

The Frame hangs flush to the wall

Our No Gap Wall Mount, included with purchase of The Frame, means just that. The Frame hangs flush to the wall just like a real picture frame. It’s easy to tilt and adjust, and blends seamlessly with your decor.

Enjoy your art whatever the lighting

The Frame features a light sensor, which intelligently detects ambient light. It adjusts the color and brightness settings so your art always looks natural regardless of where it is or what the time of day.

Features:
  • Art Mode
  • Samsung Collection
  • Premium UHD TV
  • 4K HDR Pro

entry.title: Samsung Gravity Stand (VG-SGSM11S/ZA)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Samsung
Type: TV Accessories
Price: 697.99

Experience style and elegance with extended viewing angles on the Gravity Stand with clean cable management solution. Easily tuck away cables within the stand for a clean look. The Gravity Stand is designed to look great wherever you put it. Its full-metal build seamlessly matches with its settings, adding brilliant visual appeal to your living space. A circular design also exudes a sleek, yet cozy look and feel.

Swivel with ease

With the Gravity Stand, you can turn your TV* screen by about 70 degrees (up to 35° left or right), so you can watch from wherever suits you. When you turn it, feel the sound and touch you can experience with a wind-up clock.

Attention to details

Tidy up your living room with the Gravity Stand’s smart cable management. There is no need for messy cables around your TV ― keep your space clean with the One Connect Box and Invisible Connection™ cable.
